'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{lax1}}.

==Background==
A small, but critical pass to the southeast of Kazuwari.

==Points of interest==
* Upon entering the pass, you first locate  a massive skeleton which you can identify with Survival 13 as belonging to one of the massive quadrupedal lizards that call Eora home. Religion 13 allows you to identify the specific role of this place as an altar, while Streetwise 8 will allow you to loot the hanging man's belongings, consisting of ... Further checks include History 10, which allows you to identify the etchings in the bones of this altar to carry marks of [[Huana]] craftsmanship... As well as effigies of boar-headed kith. 
* Failing to sneak through the location will trigger an encounter with the boarmen. Or rather, men with boars.

==Characters==
* [[Hateno]], leader of the boarmen.
* [[Scibéal]]
title: Rebūtara Pass
